pages.text: Volcanic Fumarole generates in barren biomes like desert and taiga.
Volcanic Fumarole contains a vent in the middle, if two blocks below it is lava, it would become active, causing fire and generate pumice bloom in nearby water.
Mining pumice bloom yields pumice, an important building material. Pick it with silk touch to get pumice bloom.
Active vents are free heat source, can provide heat at a lower speed.
